Koga Shuko/Serpentor/Sixshot/Anubis/Hades/Unitron:




Koga Shuko grunted as blasts hit his heavily armored body.  Raising his 
missile launcher, he fired off a rocket at the space between Gremlin and 
Jackle.

---

Serpentor chuckled, feeling mass flames cover his body, barely able to keep 
from screaming, firing a plasma blast from his plasma launcher off at 
Rampage's face while he was in tank mode.

---

Sixshot swerved to the left in the air quickly from above, a few shots 
scraping against his cockpit.  Bringing up the targeting computer, he fired 
one missile off at Scourge, another at Rampage's left tread, and 20 rapid 
laser bolts rained down at Black Arachnia.

---

Unitron dodged Transantulas' shots, but the autogun fire left numerous small 
dents on the bottom of his space fighter mode.  Getting a target lock, he 
fired off two missiles at a group of autoguns attached to the Predacon base.  
Opening a shaft on the bottom of his current mode, a 5 ft long, 3 ft wide 
bomb dropped, descending rapidly towards Transantulas.

---

Hades slammed into a rock, slipping to his skid plate, firing off three optic 
blasts 

---

Anubis rolled to the left, a few shots hiting him in the side.  Raising his 
missile launcher, he fired a rocket off at Marine's abdomen.
